thread.title: Terry McCrann: After a wild week, the answers to two big questions will decide what happens next
thread.title_full: Terry McCrann: After a wild week, the answers to two big questions will decide what happens next | Business News | Business and Finance News | | The Advertiser

author: Terry McCrann
title: Terry McCrann: After a wild week, the answers to two big questions will decide what happens next
text:
BY ANY definition, it was an interesting week for share investors.
On Monday, $60 billion was wiped off the value of their shares. By Friday, all that had been recovered and a bit more, although the market was starting to look fragile again late in the day.
In his weekly video wrap, above, Terry McCrann says that what happens next turns on the same two big questions that set off the turmoil.
What is really going on in China? And will the Fed raise interest rates in September, or indeed at all this year?
He also makes his call what the Reserve Bank board will do when it meets next week.
 After a wild ride, what happens next?
